Zendesk

Platform Product Manager

Melbourne, Australia from 2014

Zendesk is looking for a Product Manager to own and deliver our next generation development platform. Your team will transform how our ecosystem of 45,000 customers, 120 partners, and hundreds of of third-party developers leverage our Apps Framework and API to extend the Zendesk platform. You will work closely with our platform marketing team to evolve Zendesk into a leading customer service software platform.

Product Designer

Copenhagen, Denmark from 2014

At Zendesk, our goal is to help bring companies and their customers closer together. We know that communication is the key to happy relationships, so we build software that makes customer conversations easy and more productive. Our team takes a shared approach to work projects, collaborating when helpful and offering constructive critiques on a regular basis. Most importantly, we instill everything we do with calm, focus, and a sense of humor. As a Product Designer on Zendeskâ€™s Creative team, you will be responsible for every aspect of the user experience, from imagining our next product innovation to tweaking pixels before launch. You will be expected to apply your full range of product design, interaction and visual design skills, and work closely with project teams to grow concepts through design exploration and ideation.

View Full Job Description →



UI Designer

Dublin, Ireland from 2014

If you are a passionate designer interested in helping us visualize the future of Zendesk mobile products, we would like to hear from you. You will be part of the product design team working closely with product managers and developers to grow concepts through design exploration, ideation and user validation.
